alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, south central Holt and northwestern Wheeler Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amelia, or 22 miles southwest of O`Neill, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chambers, Amelia, Buffalo Flats, Sunfish Lake and Gables. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 146 and 147, and between mile markers 150 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
